creator: Igor Chekachkov
caption: Lena and Oleg solving a jigsaw puzzle on the first evening they arrived to western Ukraine. "It helps to distract from what I experienced", says Lena. She spent six days in the bombed Kharkiv. 10 years ago I started my “Daily Life” series, documenting how people share a common space. Today I continue to take photographs of people who was forced to leave their home because of russian invasion to Ukraine and now share the space with people who host them, as well as other displaced.
